attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned, sick of feral gangs roaming our streets unchecked, respectfully request the Prime Minister to bring back Corporal punishment for repeat youth offenders. The Rotan, a form of corporal punishment used in Singapore proves the worth of this as re-offending is almost non existent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
